fields.description: Dash 12m in the target direction. Restore [Healing Rate:150%] Vitality and 25 MP.

Leap to the target location. Upon landing, grants  
[Target-based Max HP 22%] Shield to nearby allies for 6s.

Quickly dash behind target, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and increasing Basic Attack Damage by 40% for 6s. Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges
Dashes 6m in target direction. Gains 15% Critical Rate for 5s. Stacks up to 2 times. Can be used again within 4s.
Increases Movement Speed by 55% for 5s. Creates a frost path that lasts 4s. Enemies in the path are slowed by 40% and their Attack Speed is reduced by 45% for 2s.

Increases Movement Speed by 55%, lasting 5s; creates a path of corruption lasting 4s along movement path.
Enemies in the path suffer 35% reduced damage dealt and
30% reduced healing received for 5s.
Increases Movement Speed by 30%, enters Stealth after 1s, gaining +60% Movement Speed for 4s. Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaks Stealth

Grants a  
[Target-based Max HP 25%] shield lasting 4s and
swaps positions with target player.
Increases Movement Speed by 60%, Attack Speed by 35%, for 5s.
Enhances Movement Speed by 30%, Max HP and Current HP by 80%, and grants Immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) for 6s.
Remove Slow and immobilize effects. Increases Movement Speed by 80% and gains immunity to Slow and immobilize effects for 4s.
Increases Attack Speed by 30%, Spellcasting Speed by 30%, and Movement Speed by 30% for nearby allied targets, lasting 5s.
For every 10% HP lost, gains 1 stack of Movement Speed Increase by 17% and damage by 4.5% for 5s. Stacks up to 7 times.

Leaps to the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup for 1s to enemies upon landing. Then adjusts direction and leaps again toward the target, dealing another 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup for 1s on enemies upon landing. During the skill's duration, immune to control effects and gains +80% Damage Resistance.
Remove control effects and dash toward target direction. Gain Control Immunity for 2s. Can be used while skills are disabled

Leave a mark at current position and dash to the target location. Upon arrival, deal 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and reduce their Damage
Resistance by 15% for 4s. Can be cast again within 5
seconds to return to original position and gain 40%
Movement Speed for 3s.

Charges forward 5 times, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 50%]. Physical Damage to enemies in path and knocking them back 4m each time. If knocked into terrain, enemies are stunned for 2s. Immune to control effects and gains +80% Damage. Resistance while charging.

After a cast time of 1.5 seconds, enters Ghost Form, increasing Movement Speed by 70%, gaining Immunity to damage and control effects for 3 seconds. Cannot cast other Skills or Attack while in Ghost Form.
Increases Movement Speed by 70% and Damage by 20% for 5s. When the effect ends, reduces Damage Resistance by 20% for 5s.
Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores 8 MP every second for 5s.

Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores 
[Healing Rate: 24%] HP every second for 5s.
Step 9m toward target direction. Increases Movement Speed by 40% for 4s.

> Grants a shield with  
[Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield Value to nearby allies for 6s. When HP is below 40%, the Shield Value increases to  
[Target-based Max HP 35%].
Gains +120 Armor (scales with Power) for 6s. While active, when taking damage from Basic Attacks or Skills, reduces the attacker's damage output by 40% and Movement Speed by 30% for 4s.
Creates a 7m radius Mana Font around the caster, lasting 6s Restores 10 MP to allies in range every 1s Increases casting speed of friendly units within by 80%

Snarls toward the target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies in range. Reduces
their Movement Speed by 40%, damage dealt by 50%, and
disables Stealth for 5s

Immediately removes all control effects, restores 
[Healing Rate:  180%] HP, and grants Control Immunity for 2s. Can be used while skills are disabled
Deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies, applies Stun for 2 seconds, and reduces Speed by 40% for 4 seconds.
Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] True Damage to nearby enemies. Damage increases by 15% for every 10% HP the target is missing.

Launches a dispel projectile that deals 
[Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies in the impact area, removes all buffs and Shield effects. Reduces target's physical damage dealt by 40%

Creates a 12m smoke screen, lasting 6s. Enter Stealth for 6s. Every 0.5s in the smoke screen grants 1 stack of +60% Attack Speed for the next Basic Attack, lasting 6s. Stacks up to 8 times. Using a skill, causing direct healing or damage, or leaving the smoke clears the smoke and removes stealth.
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies, disarms them for 4s and knocks them back 10m, and reduces their Movement Speed by 40% for 4s.
Increases Damage Resistance by 30% for 6s. During this time, reflects 100% of damage taken as Magic Damage to the attacker.

Shoots a grappling rope that deals 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the target, Immobilizes them for 2s, and pulls both toward the middle.
Sounds a war horn, lasting 5s. Allies within 7m gain 30% Damage Resistance, 50 Control Resistance, and immunity to Forced Movement effects (Knockback, Pull).

Creates a panic curse field around the caster that lasts
6s
Enemies within 6m who use skills take 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and are affected by Fear for 1.5s
Creates a Rally aura around the caster, lasting 8 seconds. Allies within 7m gain +30% Attack Speed and +30% Cooldown Reduction.

Creates a converging force field around the caster. After 1.5s, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemy targets within 7m, pulls them to the center, Stuns for 0.5s, and Slows by 30% for 4s.
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to surrounding enemies, reduces their Damage Resistance by 20% for 6s, and increases own damage by 15% for 6s.
Increases Damage Resistance by 30% and creates a weakening field around the caster, lasting 6s. Enemies within 7m deal 80% less damage and cannot enter Stealth.
Gains a shield equal to 45% of the target's Max HP for 6s. Restores 10 MP each time damage is taken while the shield is active.
Channels for 2.5s, increasing Damage Resistance by 90%. Can move during channeling but Speed is reduced by 40%.
Briefly bandage yourself, then recovers [Healing Rate: 48%] Vitality every second for 4s.
Instantly restores [Healing Rate: 120%] HP to nearby allies.
When skills deal damage, inflicts [Damage Rate: 180%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and reduces their healing received by 40% for 6s. This effect enters a 25s cooldown after triggering..

When skills deal direct damage, creates a venom zone lasting 6s at the target location. Enemies within 5m take [Damage Rate: 55%] Magic Damage every 1s and have their Magic Resistance reduced by 25%. Trigger Interval: 30s.

When healing, grants target a  
[Target-based Max HP 20%] shield for 6s Trigger Interval: 20s

When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, creates a Flame Star around the caster that lasts 6s. Enemies within 7m have their Magic Resistance reduced by 40 (Magic Resistance Reduction), and take [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every 1s.Trigger Interval: 30s
When taking damage at below 30% HP, increases Damage Resistance by 50% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 60s
When casting Skills with MP below 40%, immediately gains 15 MP per second for 8s. Trigger Interval: 45s
When taking damage from Basic Attacks, immediately gains Overclock Reflexes Passive Enhancement 50% Effect for 8s. This effect enters a 25s Cooldown after triggering.

When affected by hard control effects (Stun, Fear, Deep Freeze, Knockup, Petrify): Gains a  
[Target-based Max HP 25%] shield for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s Skill
After taking 3 Basic Attack Damages within 5s, gains 65 Block Value (scales with Power) for 6s. This effect enters a 25s cooldown after triggering.

When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, triggers an EMP blast at current position. After 1s, deals 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies within 6m, Stuns them for 1s and reduces their damage dealt by 20% for 6s Trigger Interval: 30s

When taking damage at below 30% HP, instantly enters Stealth and increases Movement Speed by 30% for 5s. After 1.5 seconds in Stealth, using a skill, dealing damage, or inflicting healing will break Stealth. Trigger Interval: 60s

When using Basic Attack, the next 5 Basic Attacks (including the triggering one) within 8s cast additional Chain Lightning onto enemy targets. Upon hitting, it automatically ricochets to the nearest target, up to 5 times, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage per hit. (Trigger Interval: 0.6 seconds) Damage is influenced by Basic Attack damage boost and can crit based on Basic Attack critical rate. Cooldown: 30s

When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, grants
+10% Critical Rate and +35% Attack Speed for 6s. Trigger Interval: 25s

When affected by Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep), Silence, or Immobilize, instantly removes all control and debuff effects, grants immunity to all control and debuff effects, increases Speed by 25%, for 3s. This effect enters a 45s cooldown after triggering.

When taking damage at below 20% HP, prevents HP from
falling below 1 and regenerates 
[Healing Rate: 36%] HP
every second for 4s. Cannot be dispelled.
Trigger Interval: 120s

When taking damage at below 40% HP, gains a
[Target-based Max HP 25%] shield and generates a
repulsion field lasting 6s. Enemies touching the field take
Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage and are knocked
back 7m.
Trigger Interval: 45s
When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, creates a sandstorm around the caster, lasting 6s. Enemies within 6m are slowed by 40% and disarmed. Trigger Interval: 30s

When damage taken within 3s exceeds 35% of max HP,
creates a healing wave that restores 
[Healing Rate: 240%]
HP to nearby allies and removes control effects.
Trigger Interval: 45s

When affected by Immobilize or Forced Movement (Knockback, Pull): Immediately removes all Immobilize, Slow and Forced Movement effects, and increases Damage Resistance by 25%, grants immunity to Slow, Immobilize, and Forced Movement for 8s. Trigger Interval: 30s.
When casting skills, increases Magic Damage dealt by 20% for 6s Trigger Interval: 30s
When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, increases Physical Damage by 20% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

When taking damage at below 30% HP, immediately restores 
[Healing Rate: 48%] HP every second for 5s. Trigger Interval: 60s

When taking direct damage from skills, has a %s1%
chance to restore %s2% HP and %s3% MP.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

When gaining a Shield, %s1% chance to increase
Basic Attack Critical Rate by %s2% for 4s
Cooldown: 30s.
When weapon skills deal direct Physical Damage, has a %s1% chance to modify the target's Armor by %s2% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

When taking direct damage from skills, has a %s1%
chance to gain  
[Target-based Max HP %s2%] Shield
Points for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

When weapon skills deal direct damage, has a %s1%
chance to restore %s2% MP.
Trigger Interval: 8s.

When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal Direct
Damage to enemies under Hard Control effects
(Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify), there is a
%s1% chance to reduce their Damage Resistance by
%s2% for 4s.
Cooldown: 30s.

When inflicting a DOT with a Weapon Basic
ttack or Skill, %s1% chance to recover %s2% HP
Cooldown: 20s.

When hit by a critical hit, has %s1% chance
 to increase Basic Attack's Critical Chance
 by %s2% for 5s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

When dodging a Basic Attack, %s1% chance to
heal for %s2%.
Cooldown: 20s.

When Basic Attacks deal direct damage, has a (melee weapons %s1% / ranged weapons %s2%) chance to gain  
[Target-based Max HP %s3%] Shield for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.
When taking Direct Damage from Basic Attacks, has a %s1% chance to increase Attack Speed by %s2% for 5s. Enters 30s cooldown after triggering.

When casting weapon skills, has a %s1% chance to
increase Cooldown Speed by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

When weapon skills deal direct Magic Damage, has
a %s1% chance to modify the target's Magic
Resistance by %s2% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 30s

When hit by Magic Damage, has a %s1% chance to
increase Magic Resistance by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

When landing a Basic Attack crit, %s1% chance to
increase Dodge by %s2% for 4s
Cooldown: s30.

When taking direct Physical Damage, has a 
%s1%chance to increase Armor by %s2% for 4s. Trigger Interval: 30s.

When inflicting Hard Control effects (Stun,
Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep) with a
Weapon Skill, %s1% chance to lower the enemy's
Healing Received by %s2% for 4s
Cooldown: 30s.

When taking direct damage from Basic Attacks, has a (melee weapons %s1% / ranged weapons %s2%) chance to increase the attacker's Attack Speed by
-%s3% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks,
has a (melee weapons %s1% / ranged weapons %s2%)
chance to modify the target's Movement Speed by
%s3% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 10s

When scoring a Critical Hit, has a %s1% chance to
modify the target's Damage Resistance by %s2% for
4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

Taking direct damage from Basic Attacks has a
chance (%s2% for ranged weapons / %s1% for melee
weapons) to grant a buff for 5s: Taking direct
damage from Basic Attacks has a chance (%s2% for
ranged weapons / %s1% for melee weapons) to deal
%s3% Physical Damage to the attacker.
Trigger Interval: 25s.

When gaining a Shield, %s1% chance to increase
Skill Critical Rate by %s2% for 4s
Cooldown: 30s.

When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks,
has a %s1% chance to increase Basic Attack
Damage by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

When affected by hard control effects (Stun, Fear,
Frozen, Knockup, Petrify), has a %s1% chance to
increase Crowd Control Resistance by %s2% for 6s.
Cooldown: 30s

Only triggers with Daggers
Against targets below 40%, Basic Attacks have a
%s1% chance to deal additional 
[Damage Rate: %s2%]Physical Damage
and apply 2 stacks of [Bleed].
Trigger Interval: 15s.
[Bleed]: Deals 
[Damage Rate: 30%] Physical
Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6
times. At max stacks, causes Hemorrhage,
removing all stacks and instantly dealing  
[Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage.

Only triggers with Radiant Fluxes
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks apply direct
healing to allies, has a %s1% chance to increase
target's Damage Resistance by %s2% for 5s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.

When dealing Direct Damage with a Weapon
Basic Attack or Skill, %s1% chance to gain 1 stack
of a %s2% damage boost buff for every 10% of
missing HP. The buff lasts 4s and stacks up to
5 times
Cooldown: 30s.

When using Chest skills, detonates after 1s to deal 
[Damage Rate: %s1%] Physical
Damage to nearby enemies and reduce their Attack
Speed by %s2% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 10s

When taking direct damage from Basic Attacks, has
a %s1% chance to trigger: for the next 5 seconds,
any direct damage from Basic Attacks reflects %s2%
Magic Damage to the attacker and modifies their
Armor by %s3% for 4s.
Cooldown: 25s.

Only triggers with Voidcallers
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks inflict DoT
effects on enemies, has a %s1% chance to inflict 2
stacks of Plague.
Trigger Interval: %s2%s.
Plague: Deals 
[Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage
every 3s for 13s. Stacks up to 10 times.

When using Boots skills, throw a trap at your feet; When triggered by an enemy, deal
[Damage Rate: %s1%] Physical Damage and stuns them for %s2%.
Trigger Interval: 20s

Only triggers with Bows
When arrows deal direct damage, has a %s1%
chance of creating an explosion at the target
location dealing 
[Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage
 and applying[Target Mark].
 Also stun for 1.5 seconds.
Trigger Interval: 20s.

Only triggers with Maces
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal Direct
Damage, has a 35% chance to create a disruption
field around the caster. Enemies within take %s1%
reduced Damage and have their Attack Speed
reduced by %s2% for 4s.
Cooldown: 20.

When using Boot skills, restores %s1% HP and
becomes immune to control effects for %s2%s.
Cooldown: 20s

When a weapon skill inflicts Hard Control effects
(Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify) or Pull
effects, it has a %s1% chance to create an
earthquake at the target's location. After a
1.5-second delay, it deals
[Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage and
applies Stun for %s3% seconds.
Cooldown: 30s.

Only triggers with Cannonades
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
damage, has a %s1% chance to trigger a flame
explosion at the target location 
that deals 
[Damage Rate: %s2%] Magic Damage 
to all enemies within 4m and inflicts 2
stacks of Burn.
Trigger Interval: 15s.
Burn: Deals 
[Damage Rate: 25%] Magic Damage
every second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. At 6
stacks, removes the effect and deals  
[Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage to enemy targets within
4m of the carrier.

When taking damage equal to more than 25%
Max HP within 2s, %s1% chance to recover %s2%
HP and gain Damage Immunity for %s3%
Cooldown: 30s.

Only triggers with Ice Foci
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
damage, has a %s1% chance to trigger a frost
explosion at the target location 
that deals 
[Damage Rate: %s2%] Magic Damage
 to all enemies within 4m and inflicts Frost.
Trigger Interval: 20s.
Frost: Movement Speed is reduced by -40% for 4s,
Slow gradually diminishes over time

When using Chest skills, there is a %s4% change to deals 
[Damage Rate: %s1%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies
and reduces their Movement Speed by %s3% and
damage dealt by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 10s

When taking direct damage from skills, has a %s1%
chance to deal 
[Damage Rate: %s2%] Magic Damage
 to all enemy targets within the damage source's range,
 drain %s4% MP, and
reduce the damage they deal by %s3% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 30s

When using Chest skills, restores %s1% HP and 
 %s2%MP to nearby allies.
Trigger Interval: 10s.

When using Boots Skills, the character gains an additional  
[Target-based Max HP %s1%] Shield Value for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 20s

When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks,
has a %s1% chance to deal additional
[Damage Rate: %s2%] Physical Damage 
to the current target and reduce
Movement Speed by %s3% for 2s.
Trigger Interval: 20s

When affected by Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep), %s1% chance to increase Crowd Control Resistance Rate by %s2% for 4s
Cooldown: 30s

When weapon skills deal direct damage, there is a
%s1% chance to trigger an explosion at the target
location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: %s2%]Magic Damage 
 and increasing
Damage Resistance by %s3% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 30s.

When Weapon Skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
 damage, has a %s1% chance to restore 2 bullet and 
 boosts Basic Attack Damage by %s2% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.

When affected by Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify), has a %s1% chance to cast a Bellow that deals %s2% Physical Damage to nearby enemies and inflicts Fear for 1s. Cooldown: 20s after activation.

Only triggers with Axes
When gaining the [Bloodthirst] buff, has a %s3%
chance to increase Attack Speed by %s2% and
Damage by %s1% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 20s.

When using a Weapon Skill, %s1% chance to
reduce the CD of weapon-exclusive skills by %s2% s
Cooldown: 30s.

Only triggers with Spears
When scoring a Critical Hit, has a %s1% chance to
increase Attack Speed by %s2% for 6s.
Cooldown: 20s

Only triggers with Greatswords
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks deal direct
damage, has a %s1% chance to gain 1 stacks of
Sword Momentum and increase Damage
Resistance by %s2% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.
Sword Momentum: Damage Boost: +3% (3% per
stack, can stack)
Damage Resistance: +4% (4% per stack, can stack)
Attack Speed: +4% (4% per stack, can stack)

Only triggers with Bloom Staves
When weapon skills or Basic Attacks directly heal
an ally with Recovery, has a %s1% * Recovery stacks
chance to grant  
[Target-based Max HP %s2%] Shield
for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 15s.
Recovery: Restores 
[Healing Rate: 12%] HP every
second for 12s, stacking up to 3 times.
Trigger Interval: 20s.
Increases Basic Attack Damage by %s1%
Increases Armor by %s1%
Increases Magic Resistance by %s1%
Increases Max MP by %s1%
Increases Skill Effect by %s1%
Increases Max HP by %s1%

After a 1s cast, continuously channels for 3s, firing Hell Salvo at the target. Each Hell Salvo deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Magic Damage to enemies hit, inflicts 1 stack of [Burn], and reduces Magic Resistance by 8% for 4s. Stacks up to 6 times.

Consumes 2 bullets to launch two Toxic Shrouds toward the target location, creating two Toxic Mist fields upon impact, lasting 6 seconds. The toxic gas field deals [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic Damage every second to enemies in range, reducing Healing Received by 25%, for 6 seconds. Gains 1 charge every 12 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 charges.

Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage + True Damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP to nearby enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]. If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, recovers 10% of Max HP and gains 40%+ Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

Thrusts in the target's direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 140%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].
Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s: Dash toward
target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 225%] Physical
Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed] to all enemies
hit. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage against
enemies with less than 40% HP.

Leap to the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Gains [Basic Attack True Damage] and +30% Attack Speed for 6s. Duration extends by 2s for each player (0.6s for each mob) hit, up to an extra 6s. [Basic Attack True Damage]: Basic Attacks deal 
[Damage Rate: 50%] additional True Damage.

Raises shield for 20s, gaining control immunity, +50% Damage Resistance, and an increased hit area. Can reactivate to deal 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage and inflict 50% Slow for 3s. Shield breaks after taking  
[Target-based Max HP 30%] damage, ending this enhanced state.

Locks onto an enemy and channels for 3s, consuming 1 Bullet every 0.5s, continuously firing bullets at the target. Each bullet deals [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies hit, applies Armor Reduction of 16 for 6s, stacking up to 3 times. The skill closes when all bullets are consumed.

Launches an ice projectile at the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and applying 30% Slow and [Chilling], for 4 seconds. Then bounces randomly up to 9 times among nearby targets. If no other enemies are present around the target, it bounces back to the caster. When bouncing back to itself, gains a Shield Value equal to 10% of the target's Max HP for 4 seconds. While this shield is active, taking Basic Attack Damage applies [Frost] to the attacker.[Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.[Chilling]: Upon stacking to 3 layers, immediately enters Frozen state for 1.5 seconds

Throws a massive axe in the target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage and knocking back enemies hit along its path. Reduces Damage dealt by 15% and grants Immunity to Spinning Blade knockback for 4s. The axe returns but does not knock back enemies.

Creates a holy domain that deals 
[Damage Rate: 300%]
Magic Damage to enemies in range and knocks them back
10m. Channels for 3s, healing allies in range for  
[Healing Rate: 60%] HP every 0.5s and increasing their Damage
Resistance by 10% for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times.

After a 1s cast, launches three scorching surges at the
target location. After 1s, the flames erupt, each dealing 
[Damage Rate: 240%] Magic Damage and inflicting 1
stack of [Burn] and Knockup for 1s to enemies in range.
Damage reduces to 50% for enemies that take damage
from more than one scorching surge.

Charges forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 67%] Physical Damage to enemies in the path. Upon reaching the destination, performs 3 strikes on enemy targets in front, each dealing [Damage Rate: 67%] Physical Damage. Each strike that hits at least one enemy target restores [Healing Rate: 67%] of its own Vitality. Can be cast again within 6s.

Throws two axes forward, each dealing 
[Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. The axes return automatically, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 144%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. The first enemy hit by each returning axe restores 
[Healing Rate: 120%] HP.

Launches a Molten Blast toward the target direction, exploding on impact with the first target, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]. The skill can be charged; if the charge duration reaches 2s, a more powerful Molten Blast is launched, exploding for [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage, applying 2 stacks of [Burn], and knocking back all targets within the explosion range by 8m. Gains 1 Charge every 18s, stacking up to a maximum of 2 Charges

Creates a freezing cyclone at the target location, lasting
5s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 60% and take  
[Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second.

Launches a freezing orb in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every 1 second to enemies in range and slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds. Within 3 seconds, you can click the skill again to blink to the current orb's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies, freezing them for 1.5 seconds, and granting allies within range a Shield equal to 15% of the target's max HP. When hit by Basic Attack Damage, applies [Frost] to the attacker.[Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.The blink can cross terrain; if the destination is unreachable, it will teleport to the nearest walkable area near the target point.

Hold to charge up to 3s. Damage area grows with charge time, reaching max size at 2s. Cannot be interrupted while charging. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to enemies in range every 0.5s during charge. When released at max charge, Pulls enemies to the caster, deals 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage and applies Slow 40% for 3s. At lower Charge stacks, only deals damage and slows.

Leaps to the target location. Upon landing, deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to all enemies in range and inflicts Knockup for 0.75s. Heals allies in range for [Healing Rate: 180%] Vitality and increases their Overclock Reflexes Passive by 30% for 6s.

Creates a Rain of Serenity at the target location for 8s.
Allies in the rain gain 25% Damage Resistance and recover 
[Healing Rate: 30%] HP every second. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage to enemies in the field every 1 second

Briefly charges up and then rushes at the target enemy, inflicting [Heal Block] for 4s and dealing Physical Damage based on [Sword Momentum] stacks. [Sword Momentum] stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Physical Damage: 
[Damage Rate: 210%] | 
[Damage Rate: 240%] | 
[Damage Rate: 270%] | 
[Damage Rate: 300%] At 3+ stacks, creates an explosion dealing 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and Stunning for 1.5s. [Heal Block]: Cannot receive healing.

Channels for 0.5s to inflict 2 stacks of [Plague] as well as
[Hexbound Malice] to enemies in range, lasting 9s.
[Hexbound Malice]: Each active skill used consumes 10
extra MP and inflicts 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic
Damage.

Places a Frost Nova at the target location, lasting 15s.
When triggered by an enemy, deals 
[Damage Rate: 250%]
Magic Damage and reduces Movement Speed by 35% and
15% reduced healing for 6s.
Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 3 charges

Launches 3 Core Flare orbs at the target location. Each
nova deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Magic Damage to
enemies along the way and inflicts 1 stack Of [Burnl and I
stack Of [Scorch]. Additional nova hits on the same target
deal damage equal to 30% Of the original damage
Gains 1 charge every 1 5s, up to 3 charges
[Scorch): Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times

Infects an enemy with [Parasites].
[Parasites]: Parasites last 12s and deal 
[Damage Rate: 50%] True Damage whenever the target takes direct
damage (minimum interval 0.8s). When dispelled, deals 
[Damage Rate: 350%] Magic Damage

Fires a Powershot in the target direction. When it hits the first enemy, it explodes, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies in range and applying Stun. The damage increases with flight distance, up to a maximum of 2 times. The Stun duration also increases with flight distance, starting at 1 second and reaching a maximum of 3 seconds when the arrow flies to 80% of its maximum range. The explosion applies 3 stacks of [Target Mark].

Knocks enemies back 8m and deals 
[Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage. Reduces Damage dealt based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 6s. Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Reduction to damage dealt: 20% | 26% | 32% | 38% At 3+ stacks, Knockback increased to 12m and Stuns for 2s on collision.

Launches a Holy Chain that bounces to the nearest allied
target within 9 meters after hitting an ally, restoring 
[Healing Rate: 120%] HP with each hit. It deals  
[Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemy targets in
range, with damage reduced to 20% for subsequent
explosions.
The chain can bounce up to 9 times, and each target can
be hit a maximum of 3 times.

Channels for 0.5s to curse a circular area. After a brief
delay, deals 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage to up to
10 enemies in range, dispeling all Buffs, shields, and HoT
effects, and inflicting [Crippled] for 6s. 
[Crippled]
Cannot use movement skills or gain buffs, shields, or HoT
effects
Movement Speed Bonus: -50%

Scans enemies in front, locking onto 1 enemy every 0.3s, up to 6 (prioritizing unselected enemies). After scanning ends, fires energy projectiles at locked targets, consuming 1 Bullet per target. Each shot deals 
[Damage Rate: 175%] Magic Damage, reveals Stealth, and gives Basic Attacks a 40% chance to miss for 6s

Infects any target with Pestilence Source for 8s. Every
second, deals 
[Damage Rate: 65%] Magic Damage to the
infected and nearby enemies. Inflicts 1 stack of [Plague]
and reduces damage dealt by 5% to enemies except the
carrier for 4s, stacking up to 5 times.

Gains 18 Splintershots and +30% Attack Speed for 20 seconds. Each Basic Attack that hits an enemy fires 2 additional arrows, each dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Magic Damage. Only the first arrow of each Splintershot applies [Target Mark].

Casts holy radiance at the target location. Heals allies in
range for 
[Healing Rate: 120%] HP and deals  
[Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies, knocking them
back 7m from the center. Gives enemies 60% chance to
miss Basic Attacks and reveals Stealth for 6s.

Deals 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and applies [Grievous Wounds]. Increases to 
[Damage Rate: 450%] against targets below 40% HP. Hold to charge up, gaining interrupt immunity and +80% Damage Resistance. After 1.5s charge, Skill Damage +150%. [Grievous Wounds]: Reduces healing by 40% for 4s.

Launches a mechanical hook forward. The first enemy hit is Stunned (ignores Control Resistance) for 1.5s, takes 
[Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage, and is Pulled to the caster.

Channels for 6s, consuming 1 Bullet per second. The skill is automatically closed when all Bullets are used up. Gains a Shield based on 40% of the target's maximum HP during channeling, can rotate slowly (only usable if at least 1 Bullet remains). Fires a large number of Bullets in a forward cone every second, dealing [Damage Rate: 85%] Physical Damage to enemies in range every 0.25s. Damage decreases with distance from the caster, reaching a minimum of 70% of original damage. Channeling cannot be interrupted and rotation is allowed.

Leaps to the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 300%]
Physical Damage and Immobilizing enemies for 2.5s on
landing. Plants a Banner of Justice that lasts 8s. Allies
within its range gain 30% Damage Resistance and 35%
Attack Speed.

Consumes 1 bullet to fire a sniper round in the target direction. The first enemy hit takes [Damage Rate: 280%] Physical Damage. This skill can be charged; if the charge duration reaches 2 seconds, the fired sniper round will pierce through enemies along the path, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage. Bullet range increases with charge time. Gains 1 charge every 6s, up to 6 charges

Removes all Control Effects and generates 6 surrounding Ice Fracture Fragments around the user for 10 seconds. While active, increases Casting Speed by 40% and Damage Resistance by 25%. When other Weapon Skills deal damage, launches 1 Ice Fracture Fragment toward the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage and applying 10% Reduced Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times

Inflicts the enemy with a Soul Snare, dealing  
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and linking with the target,
silencing both parties for 5s. During this period, the caster
gains [Soul Snare]. The link breaks if distance exceeds
12m. 
[Soul Snare]
Critical Rate: +30%
Damage Resistance: +50%
Attack Speed: +30%
Cannot use skills

Performs a sweeping strike, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 300%]
Physical Damage and knocking enemies back 8m.
Increases the caster's Damage Resistance by 50% for 6s.
Creates a disruption field lasting 8s that Slows enemies
within 8m by 30% and reduces their damage by 20%.

Charges at the target enemy, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Stun for 1s
(ignores Control Resistance). Throws the target
backward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical
Damage to enemies in the landing area and reducing their
Movement Speed by 30% for 3s.

Launches Root Worms in the target direction. Upon
hitting an enemy target, it will bounce to other enemy
targets within 7 meters up to 9 times. Each target can be
hit a maximum of 3 times.
Each hit deals 
[Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage
Stuns the target for 1s, and reduces damage dealt by 20% for 9s.

Grants Thorn Barrier to up to 5 nearby allies.
Thorn Barrier increases Damage Resistance by 20%, Cast Speed by 40% and
Attack Speed by 25% for 6s.
When taking direct damage, recovers 
[Healing Rate: 66%]
HP up to 6 times; also Slows the attacker by 25% for 3s.

Fires an Arcbolt in the target direction, which explodes on contact with enemies, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and attaching a Thunderstorm Field. The Thunderstorm Field lasts 8s, dealing [Damage Rate: 45%] Physical Damage every second to enemy targets within 6m, applying 10 Armor Reduction for 4s, up to 5 stacks. Explosion applies 3 stacks of [Target Mark].

Gains immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Attack range and Max HP increase based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 10s (Cannot be dispelled) Can use [Titan's Stride] to deal 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Knockup enemies for 0.5s. [Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Basic Attack range: 1.5 | 2 | 2.5 | 3 Max HP: 30% |45% | 60% | 75% At 3+ stacks, creates a titan aura that Slows enemies by 30% and reduces Attack Speed by 30%.

Teleports toward the target direction, leaving a dagger at the original location. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and drains 25 MP to nearby enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]; recasting the skill within 5 seconds returns to the dagger's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and draining 25 MP to nearby enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed].

Inflicts natural toxins on the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage every 1 second while reducing Attack Speed by 30% and Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. The toxin's duration is refreshed whenever the target takes damage from the caster's Weapon Skills.
Creates a Healing Bloom aura around the caster. Allies within gain 15% increased Healing Received. Consumes 3 MP every second to restore [Healing Rate: 27%] HP to nearby allies.

Unleashes a powerful sword energy toward the target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies hit. Additional effects based on [Sword Momentum] stacks: 1 stack: 30% Slow for 2s. 2 stacks: 30% Slow for 2s and Silence for 2s. 3-6 stacks: 30% Slow for 4s and Silence for 4s. At 3+ stacks, unleashes 2 extra Sword Energy. Additional Sword Energy deals 30% reduced damage.

Slams the ground to deal 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies, dispel all buffs, reduce their damage dealt by 50% for 8s, and inflict Silence for 3s. Max targets affected: 15.

Fires three Tempest Arrows forward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage, reducing Attack Speed by
35% for 4s, and knocking targets back 5m. Enemies
knocked into terrain are Stunned for 2.5s.
When multiple arrows hit the same target, the damage
from arrows beyond the first is reduced by 30%.

Fires two heavy rounds that create a gravity vortex where they meet. Enemies in the vortex are Slowed by 25%. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in the vortex after 1.5s, pulling them to the center and Stunning for 1s.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 320%] Physical Damage to enemy targets around self upon landing, while also applying 3 stacks of [Bleed] and [Healing Reduction], lasting for 4s. The target cannot be affected by Sanguine Pounce's [Healing Reduction] effect again within 8s. If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, its Cooldown is reduced to 8s. [Healing Reduction]: Cannot receive Heal.

Creates a Blessed Halo at the target location. After 1s,
heals all allies in range for 
[Healing Rate: 360%] HP,
cleanses all control effects and 5 debuffs, and grants
immunity to Control and Slow for 4s.

Throws a corroding lance at the target location, dealing
Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies hit
and reducing their Max HP by 15% for 4s. Creates an
expanding corrosive field lasting 5s that reduces
Movement Speed by 40% and deals 
[Damage Rate: 80%]
Magic Damage every second to enemies within.
Gains 1 charge every 25s, up to 2 charges

Fires a Shadow Vortex Arrow in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and remaining on them. After 0.5 seconds, it converges, inflicting [Damage Rate: 280%] Magic Damage to enemies within a 7-meter radius, pulling them to the center, and applying 40% Slow for 3 seconds. It also applies 3 layers of Target Mark upon convergence. Gains 1 charge every 15 seconds, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

Launches an ice blade forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies in its path, applying 1 stack of [Hypothermia] and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. When [Hypothermia] reaches 6 stacks, the target gains [Deep Frost]. After launching two ice blades, the third ice blade's damage increases to [Damage Rate: 145%] Magic Damage. [Deep Frost]: Cannot perform Basic Attacks or Move. Lasts 1.5 seconds.

Creates a frost crystal at the target location that forms
after 0.7s, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 75%] Magic Damage
and Freezing enemies for 1.5s.
After 1s, the crystal shatters, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 400%] Magic Damage, and reducing Movement Speed by
40% and Attack Speed by 40% for 6s

Dashes forward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Reduces Damage Resistance based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 4s. [Sword Momentum] stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Damage Resistance reduction: 15% | 24% | 32% | 40% At 3+ stacks, Pulls enemies to the center on arrival and slashes multiple times over 1.8s, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage every 0.3s.

Shoots 3 Severance Shots in the target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies hit
along the path, reducing their healing received by 20% for
4s.
When multiple Severance Shots hit the same target, the
damage of arrows beyond the first is reduced by 30%.
Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges

Enters Molten Volley mode for 20s. Cannot move during this time; can be exited actively. Basic Attack Replaced: Launches magma at the target location. The magma rolls forward after impact, dealing [Damage Rate: 165%] Magic Damage to enemies along its path and inflicting 2 stacks of [Burn]. Damage increases by 8% for each hit, up to a maximum increase of 40%.

Throws a Necrotic Eruption device at the target location. Every 2 seconds, Death Clouds randomly spawn around the device (the device's range gradually expands), lasting for 10 seconds. The Death Clouds deal [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic Damage every second to enemy targets in range, inflicting [Plague], and reducing Healing Effect by 5% for 12 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

Dashes in the target direction, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 260%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup on for 1s.
Inflicts Disarm and reduces Movement Speed by 30% for 4s
Gains 1 charge every 18s, up to 2 charges

Activates Photon Activation for 20s. Immune to Slow and Immobilize. Gains [Prism Beam] and [Prism Camo]—[Photon Beam]—
Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage and drains 5 MP from enemies in the front area. After 3 beams, the next Basic Attack becomes Enhanced Photon Beam, dealing [Damage Rate: 135%] Physical Damage and draining 5 MP from enemies in the front area.
—[Photon Camouflagel—
Removes all control effects. Gain Stealth and +30% Movement Speed for 2s. Can be used while skills are disabled

Plants a Divine Rootfall that lasts 20s. After 1s, the tree
matures and restores 
[Healing Rate: 24%] HP every
second to nearby allies. When enemies cast skills in
range, it shoots sleep seeds that deal 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and inflict Sleep for 2.5s. The tree is destroyed after taking 10 Basic Attack hits

Dashes forward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical
Damage to all enemies hit, inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed],
and reducing Damage Resistance by 20% for 4s.
Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s:
Deals 
[Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemies
in a frontal cone, inflicts 3 stacks of [Bleed] while also
leaping backward

Cleanses an ally or the caster of all Slow and Immobilize
effects, heals 
[Healing Rate: 360%] HP and grants
Sanctuary for 5s.
Sanctuary grants immunity to Slow and Immobilize, and
prevents HP from falling below 1. Each 10% of missing
HP increases healing received by 5%.
Sanctuary cannot be dispelled.

Channels a starforge beam for 4s after a 1s cast. Deals 
[Damage Rate: 85%] Magic Damage to enemies in range
every 0.5s, inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] and [Scorch].
Each hit increases damage by 10%, up to 50%.
Cannot be interrupted during channeling and grants a
[Target-based Max HP 25%] shield.
[Scorch]: Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks
up to 3 times.

Leaps to the target location, creating countless blades. Physical Damage scales with [Sword Momentum] stacks. [Sword Momentum] Stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3-6 Physical Damage: 
[Damage Rate: 280%] | 
[Damage Rate: 320%] | 
[Damage Rate: 360%] | 
[Damage Rate: 400%] At 3+ stacks, creates two sets of blades forming outward, each dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting 1s Knockup.

Heals allies along the path for [Healing Rate: 210%] HP, purifies all Crowd Control effects and 5 stacks of Damage over Time, grants Immunity to Damage over Time and increases Healing Received by 35% for 6 seconds.

Leaps to the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting 1.5s Knockup on enemies. Creates a thunderstorm field that lasts 6s. Enemies within 7m have their Damage Resistance reduced by 15% and take 
[Damage Rate: 70%] Physical Damage every second.

Enters Deadshot mode for 20s. Cannot move during this time and can exit actively. Basic Attack Replacement: Uses 1 Bullet to shoot in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 190%] Physical Damage to enemy targets along the path. Damage increases by 10% for each enemy hit along the path, up to a maximum of 50%.

Spin toward the target location. Each hit deals 
[Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage. The final hit deals 
[Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage and knocks enemies up for 1.5s. Creates dual spinning axes that last 6s and deal 
[Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage every 0.5s.

Plants a Bloom of Malice seed before channeling energy
to it for 3s. The seed grows gradually until blooming
(press skill again to bloom early). When blooming, deals 
[Damage Rate: 360%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies,
inflicts [Plague] based on growth time, and reduces Max
HP by 2.5% for 12s (stacks up to 10 times).
Effects increase with growth time ([Plague] stacks 1-2->
3-10 / Max HP stacks 1 ->10)

Launches a spinning bladewheel toward the target that cuts enemies along the path, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage, and the destination. Spins for 5s, Slowing enemies by 30% and dealing 
[Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage every 0.5s while also inflicting [Grievous Wounds]. Each hit increases the wheel's damage by 10% up to 50%. The wheel returns to the caster afterward. [Grievous Wounds]: Reduces healing by 40% for 4s.

Deals 
[Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to all nearby players (
[Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to mobs) every 0.5s for 5s. Can move freely while channeling. Cannot be interrupted but cannot cancel skill. Upon stopping the whirlwind, deals 
[Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies. The damage of the final slash increases based on hits while spinning, up to 
[Damage Rate: 400%] Physical Damage.

After 1s cast, launches scorching flames at the target
location to create Hellfire.
Hellfire lasts 6s, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 70%] Magic
Damage to all players (
[Damage Rate: 140%] Magic
Damage to mobs) within and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]
every 1s.

Leaps to the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to all players (
[Damage Rate: 375%] Physical Damage to mobs) in range. Grants  
[Target-based Max HP 6%] Shield for each enemy hit, lasting 6s. Stacks up to 5 times.

Creates 3 explosions in the target area. Each explosion deals 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to players
([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs). The caster is healed for 
[Healing Rate: 72%] HP if at least one enemy is hit.

Channels for 3s, releasing frost winds in the target
direction that deal 
[Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage
to players (
[Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs)
every 0.5s and reduce Movement Speed by 30% for 3s.
Can move slowly while channeling

Rains arrows down at the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to players
(
[Damage Rate: 270%] Physical Damage to mobs) and
inflicting 30% Slow for 3s.
Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges

Leaps to the target and strikes, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage and applying 2 stacks of [Bleed].Recovers 
[Healing Rate: 132%] HP.
Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

Grants a shield of  
[Target-based Max HP 25%] to the
caster or an ally for 4s.
When the shield breaks, deals 
[Damage Rate: 250%] Magic
Damage to nearby enemies.

After a 1s cast, doubles the stacks of [Plague] on an
enemy target and refreshes the duration to maximum. If
the doubled stacks exceed the limit, deals (
[Damage Rate: 55%] per stack) Magic Damage for excess stacks.
If the target does not have [Plague], inflicts at least one
stack of [Plague] and deals 
[Damage Rate: 55%] Magic
Damage.

Swings forward repeatedly, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] (to players) / [Damage Rate: 240%] (to monsters) Physical Damage to enemies in range, and finally deals [Damage Rate: 180%] (to players) / [Damage Rate: 360%] (to monsters) Physical Damage to enemies in range. Each attack also applies Armor Reduction of 7, lasting 6s, stacking up to 4 times.

Consumes 2 bullets to fire two shotgun blasts forward, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 110%] Physical Damage to players (
[Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage to mobs) in range. Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges.

Spins toward the target location, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to all players (
[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs) hit. At 3+ Sword Momentum stacks, creates a tornado on arrival, dealing 
[Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage every 1s for 5s.
